content: A new proposal has been announced #270. It will be brought up at the next meeting.
Hi @bjorn3! Sorry that we've not given you any feedback on this yet. =)
I was thinking it would be good to acquire a bit more experience with git subtree and clippy before we act
@oli or @Manish Goregaokar, have we done a reverse merge with clippy yet?
I noticed in some recent refactorings that I've been fixing up clippy code right alongside the rest, which seems good

@simulacrum wrote earlier

I suspect we will also want to line up a technical reviewer for compiler integration, though I think I can review that as well (and to some extent I don't know that there will be review required there beyond cleanup that occurs in an ongoing fashion).

and I agree with that

nikomatsakis said:

I was thinking it would be good to acquire a bit more experience with git subtree and clippy before we act

Exactly my thoughs!
